articles.title: Explained: Tax rate changes decided by the GST Council
articles.description: In the changes, which are expected to affect consumers at the most basic level, GST exemption has been withdrawn from ‘pre-packaged and labelled’ retail packs, but items sold loose or unlabelled shall continue to remain exempt.
articles.content: The Goods and Services Tax (GST) Council in its 47th meeting held last week undertook a series of rate changes as part of correction of inverted duty structure, withdrawal of certain exemptions in wh… [+10620 chars]

articles.title: J&K villagers capture two LeT militants, one an ‘ex-BJP man’
articles.description: J&K Police identified the two captured militants as Talib Hussain Shah from Draj village in Rajouri and Faizal Ahmed Dar from Pulwama.

articles.title: Night Before Vote, Eknath Shinde Named Shiv Sena's Legislative Leader
articles.description: In a major setback to the Uddhav Thackeray faction a day before the crucial trust vote of the Eknath Shinde-BJP government, the newly-appointed speaker of the Maharashtra Assembly on Sunday night removed Ajay Chaudhary as the legislative party leader
articles.content:
The development comes as a major blow to the Uddhav Thackeray faction comprising 16 MLAs.

articles.title: 3 dead in shooting at Denmark mall, police checking terror angle
articles.description: At least three people were killed and three others were critically injured in a shooting at a shopping centre in Denmark's Copenhagen.
articles.content:
A gunman opened fire inside a busy shopping mall in the Danish capital Sunday, killing three people and critically wounding three others, police said.

articles.author: TIMESOFINDIA.COM
articles.title: BJP's Rahul Narwekar elected as Maharashtra assembly speaker
articles.description: India News: BJP's Rahul Narwekar was on Sunday elected the speaker of Maharashtra assembly. Narwekar bagged a majority 164 votes and defeated MVA candidate Rajan
articles.content: India News: BJP's Rahul Narwekar was on Sunday elected the speaker of Maharashtra assembly. Narwekar bagged a majority 164 votes and defeated MVA candidate Rajan
